description: This type represents a subscription request related to notifications about VNF faults.

filter.description: Filter settings for this subscription, to define the subset of all notifications this subscription relates to. A particular notification is sent to the subscriber if the filter matches, or if there is no filter.

callbackUri.description: The URI of the endpoint to send the notification to.

authentication.description: Authentication parameters to configure the use of Authorization when sending notifications corresponding to this subscription. This attribute shall only be present if the subscriber requires authorization of notifications.
